title: Low Priority Que Appeals?
body:
Is there a way to actually appeal low priority ques?

I don't mind explaining what happened, sometimes life situations occur and we can't help it, but should those people be always punished?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately not, the leaverbuster system is automated and punishments are unable to be removed, the system is setup in such a way to prevent corruption.

Riot understands that sometimes real life situations can take you away from gameplay and the system has been implemented to cater for these, you won't get punished after leaving one, maybe a few games. However if you make a habit of it you'll receive punishment.

For more information on Leaverbuster please see the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

except.. i played 2 games one game last night and one game this morning and both i was getting attempting reconnect but my internet was fine. repaired my league client and then i got on to low priority que. that wasnt a real life situation. the previous day it was working fine. In other words this system is designed to if you mess up one time you are screwed cus your account is marked.

Hey there,

We prefer to keep separate issues to their own threads to provide better support to users.

However, it sounds as if you were experiencing a connection issue (Keep in mind your connection to other services may not have been impacted)

Have you experienced connection troubles since this occurred? Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
